TopicTitle: Every time I reply to/post a thread, it auto-subscribes me to it.

Articles.Content: I am experiencing an extreme problem in the Forum Games. Whenever I reply to a game thread, it subscribes me to the thread without telling me. It's incredibly annoying.

Hmm... There should be an option under "General Settings" in your personal account settings that allows you to toggle the option on and off. Can you double-check to make sure it's set to "Do not subscribe" right now?
